name: io.github.YanxingLiu/dify-mcp-server
description: A simple implementation of an MCP server for using dify workflows. It achieves the invocation of the Dify workflow by calling the tools of MCP.

environment_variables.name: DIFY_BASE_URL
environment_variables.description: The base URL for your Dify API.

environment_variables.name: DIFY_APP_SKS
environment_variables.description: Comma-separated list of your Dify App Secret Keys (SKs).
